Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius). Grease and flour an 8-inch round cake pan.
Mix brown sugar, 1/4 cup of white sugar, and cinnamon in a small bowl; set the mixture aside.

Beat the butter and 1/4 cup of sugar until light and fluffy in a medium bowl; then mix in the sour cream, vanilla, and egg. In another bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt before adding it to the creamed mixture and blending well.
Spread half of the batter into the prepared cake pan, add raisins, then sprinkle half of the topping mixture over the raisins. Finally, spread the remaining batter over the top.
Bake in a preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Serve the cake warm.
